reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly family run hotel, staff were excellent and nice buffet breakfast.We stayed on bed & breakfast for
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: our stay which gave us more freedom and no rush to get back for evening meals.
reviews.title: A hotel with 'Old World' charm overlooking Lake Lucerne, just 20 minutes walk from the Old Town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Returning to the hotel in the evenings about 20 mins walk from lucerne centre and feeding the ducks,and swans enroute ,then having a last drink and just watching the ships go by from the hotel terrace was a great way to unwind and get to know the family who gave us tips on places to visit, mind you their weather forcasting was a bit dodgy.
reviews.title: A short walk from the hustle and bustle

reviews.text: We had a great 7 days here, Our trips to Rigi, Pilatus, and the Stanserhorn were out of this world especially Rigi. Comming back from the Stanserhorn we stopped of at Hergiswil to see the glass factory this is worth a visit you can even have a shot at glass blowing.
reviews.title: No stars

reviews.text: Our trip to the transport museum, when it rained one day was very interesting and although we spent some 6 hours there we still did not see it all.
reviews.title: Climb High, See Wide

reviews.text: My friends and I discovered The Hotel Royal and the owners 'The Royal Family' during our visit for the Rowing world cup regatta.
reviews.title: The friendliest and best hotel in Lucerne!!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Since that first visit we have returned many times in groups of upto 8 people.
reviews.title: Our new favorite hotel!

reviews.text: It is in a fantastic position on a hill looking over Lake Lucerne with a view of Mount Pilatus.
reviews.title: Charming, family-run hotel

reviews.text: We could find no fault with the hotel and found it to be EXCELLENT value
reviews.title: My Back is still aching and it's October

reviews.text: We happened upon this delightful family-run hotel on Easter, 2009. We were given a lovely newly decorated room with a balcony...and a view of the lake and mountains. The rate was excellent and the breakfast was superb. The owner recommended a wonderful walk for us. This is the way hotels are supposed to run.
reviews.title: mixed feelings
Nice view but bad service
reviews.text: I visited Lucerne and stayed at Hotel Royal. The view was good and the lobby was elegant.

reviews.title: Lovely hotel in a quiet neighborhood of Lucerne
reviews.text: But I was upset by their service. Our luggage got messy and we wanted some help from the manager. We asked for paper towel and changed the bedding sheet.
